授業目的:
The purposes of this course are for students to:
・ Improve vocabulary and grammar with a particular focus on academic writing, as opposed to colloquial English,
・ Engage in writing related to sciences using cited research while avoiding plagiarism, and
・ Engage in writing for fluency through a variety of topics.
到達目標:
At the end of the semester, students should be able to
・ Write an effective paragraph in English that includes evidence of cited research,
・ Write well-structured paragraphs with topic, supporting, and concluding sentences, and
・ Demonstrate written proficiency in English grammar, mechanics and punctuation following the IEEE system.
